# ChatGPT-input-helper
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub--_.svg?style=social&logo=GitHub)](https://github.com/we684123/ChatGPT-input-helper) [![](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=%20&message=GreasyFork&style=flat-square&labelColor=7B0000&color=960000&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://greasyfork.org/scripts/460991-chatgpt-input-helper) 


滑一滑~ 點一點~ 施法更輕鬆~  
swipe~ tap~  casting made easy~  

----

----

## install
請先安裝 [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/)  
然後再透過 Greasyfork 安裝 [ChatGPT-input-helper](https://greasyfork.org/zh-TW/scripts/460991-chatgpt-input-helper)  


Please install [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/)   first  
and then install [ChatGPT-input-helper](https://greasyfork.org/zh-TW/scripts/460991-chatgpt-input-helper) through Greasyfork.  


----

## PR

commit style 請使用 [gitmoji](https://gitmoji.dev/)
